description.value:
You embody the power of the whirling sands, and call forth a raging sandstorm to envelop your foes as you strike at the earth. Spend your Zeal and Strike at a target with a groundward attack, upheaving forth sand and rock. The target and creatures adjacent to them excluding you need to make a @Check[fortitude|against:dervish] Fortitude saving throw against your class DC or suffer a condition based on the amount of your zeal spent:

  • 1-3 Zeal: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}

  • 4-5 Zeal: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature becomes Dazzled for 1 round.

Failure The creature becomes Dazzled or Blinded for 1 round.

Critical Failure As Failure, but creatures become Dazzled or Blinded for 2 rounds.
